post.text: Debate is over but the fight isn't. The FINAL FEC deadline for the entire campaign is minutes away at 11:59p! Donate now to make this a RECORD NIGHT. Contribute $10 >> DonaldJTrump.com/Debate

comment.author: Eric
comment.text: Hillary president? Open borders? She's anti Christian, look for more beheading in America, terrorist walking down your street to force another religion.

replies.author: Adam
replies.text: Yes much better for you to force everyone into your religion. Makes sense

replies.author: Brooke
replies.text: It's not even that she is anti-Christian, it's that she supports illegals and terrorist groups. In fact, most everything she supports is a virus to our Country!

replies.author: Thomas
replies.text: If she is elected that's what we will be walking into SUE, it is a very scary situation.

replies.author: Eric
replies.text: I just heard Megyn Kelly say that the women insults rumors have brought Trump down, yet she continues to bring it up and harp on it! Who's side is she on?! I think she needs to go over to the democrats if she's feeling she should attack the people's chosen candidate that she's should support!
